name: GG3
description: GG3 represents a groundbreaking innovation in intelligent community engagement building, powered by sophisticated AI technology that learns from major gaming & community platforms including Steam, YouTube, Discord and Twitch. With access to data from over 100.000 Steam games and real player behaviour analytics, GG3 seamlessly connects Web2 gamers to the boundless opportunities of Web3 through personalised, AI-driven experiences. The platform's Intelligence Engine revolutionises community management, generates engaging quests & viral content as well as provides 24/7 intelligent moderation across gaming communities and beyond. By addressing the industry's pressing challenge of engaging gamers, GG3 delivers real-time insights on gaming inventory and crypto holdings, while its AI gaming assistant offers optimised tips, solutions and reward-maximising Quests for the games gamers love. AI Agent infrastructure based on partners - GamerHash AI & Aethir. GG3 is also part of the Aethir Catalyst program and will be launched on the BSC chain with support from The Foundation. Smart contract is audited by Hacken.
